title: Overall technologist focusing on front-end
summary: Wei-Jye is an Angular developer and Software Ninjaneer. As a web and mobile hybrid developer focusing on front-end, Wei-Jye enjoys solving coding challenges, particularly in UI and UX design. In his free time, Wei-Jye loves to explore GitHub looking for opportunities to learn and contribute to open-source projects. He believes in free, open-source software. His love for anime and games is just a little less than his love for coding.
